ShortDescription.Value: Temporary solution for fixing simple fixes with assets, whether vanilla or custom

Publish.LongDescription:
This mod makes simple fixes that prevents some assets from functioning or just to make it look good.
## Current Fixes: ### Global * Prison Van Spawn: Change the vanilla Prison Van's size class from Medium to Large so it can spawn from the prisons. (Requires replopping) * Storage Section: Fix Storage Section not being shown for service buildings that require resources. (Requires save reloading, disabled by default) * Recycling System: Fix any Recycling buildings not being able to sell their products. (Requires save reloading) ### Vanilla * Prison's Van Count: Change the vanilla Prison's Prison Van capacity from 10 to 20 to fill up all the service vehicle parkings. (Requires replopping) * Hospital Service Parking: Change the vanilla Hospitals' service vehicle parking count from 10 to 30. (Instant change) ### Region Packs * Hovering Poles & Signs: Fix hovering poles and signs present in China and US South West Region Packs. (Instant change)
If you have more suggestion of fixes to be added, be sure to find me and inform me.
